content: I can't seem to find any tests for the "Fill struct fields" quick fix, do we have any for that?

Commenting the fix our shows the following failtures:

failures:
diagnostics::tests::range_mapping_out_of_macros
diagnostics::tests::test_fill_struct_fields_empty
diagnostics::tests::test_fill_struct_fields_enum
diagnostics::tests::test_fill_struct_fields_partial
diagnostics::tests::test_fill_struct_fields_self
I think we probably should have one file per diagnostics, which contains both the diagnostics, the fix, and the tests
basically, the same org we use for assists
